summary: In the mythical land of Huadu, Charcoal Head, a humble boy born to rule an empire must undertake his journey to claim his throne. It is an epic action adventure combining romance, fantasy, comedy and cutting edge Hong Kong style martial artistry.
cast: Charlene Choi|Gillian Chung|Ying Qu|Jaycee Chan|Bo-lin Chen|Tony Ka Fai Leung|Edison Chen|Yueyun Liang|Donnie Yen|Jackie Chan|Mou Kit|Bingbing Fan|Daniel Wu|Sam Yu-Sum Chan|Xie Jing-Jing|Steven Cheung|Kenny Kwan|Siu-Wai Kam|Sui-man Chim|Nga Lee
director: Directors: Patrick Leung, Corey Yuen (as Cory Yuen)
title: Crónicas de Huadu
